as Prince Andrew. They had known each other previously in Peters- burg, but had become more intimate when Prince Andrew was in Vienna with Kutuzov. 
Just as Prince Andrew was a young man who gave promise of rising high in the military pro- fession, so to an even greater extent Bilibin gave promise of rising in his diplomatic career. He was still a young man but no longer a young diplomat, as he had entered the service at the age of sixteen, had been in Paris and Copen- hagen, and now held
